mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def most_frequent_word(text: str) -> str:
    words = re.findall('', text.lower())
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count.most_common(1)[0][0]

import re
from collections import Counter

def most_frequent_word(text: str) -> str:
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count.most_common(1)[0][1]

import re
from collections import Counter

def most_frequent_word(text: str) -> str:
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count.most_common(1)[0][-1]

import re
from collections import Counter

def most_frequent_word(text: str) -> str:
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    word_count = Counter(words)
    return word_count.most_common(-1)[0][0]
